de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.optionhandling.parameters

Class RandomParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.optionhandling.parameters.AbstractParameter<RandomParameter,RandomFactory>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.optionhandling.parameters.RandomParameter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parameter<RandomFactory>

    public class RandomParameter
extends AbstractParameter<RandomParameter,RandomFactory>
    Parameter for random generators and/or random seeds.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomParameter

        public RandomParameter(OptionID optionID)
        Constructor without default.
        Parameters:
        optionID - Option ID

      • RandomParameter

        public RandomParameter(OptionID optionID,
                       RandomFactory defaultValue)
        Constructor with default value. The default value may be null, which means a new random will be generated.
        Parameters:
        optionID - Option ID
        defaultValue - Default value. If null, a new random object will be created.

      • RandomParameter

        public RandomParameter(OptionID optionID,
                       long seed)
        Constructor with default seed value.
        Parameters:
        optionID - Option ID
        seed - Default seed.
